verses.kjv: Again in the ninth year, in the tenth month, in the tenth day of the month, the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: In the 9th year, on the 10th day of the 10th month, a message from the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, write thee the name of the day, even of this same day: the king of Babylon set himself against Jerusalem this same day.
verses.ct: "Son of man, write down today's date — this exact day — because the king of Babylon has launched his siege against Jerusalem on this very day."

verses.kjv: And utter a parable unto the rebellious house, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Set on a pot, set it on, and also pour water into it:
verses.ct: "Tell a parable to this rebellious people. Say to them, 'This is what the Lord GOD says: Put a cooking pot on the fire, set it in place, and fill it with water.

verses.kjv: Gather the pieces thereof into it, even every good piece, the thigh, and the shoulder; fill it with the choice bones.
verses.ct: Put all the best cuts of meat into it — the thigh and the shoulder. Pack it full of the finest bones.

verses.kjv: Take the choice of the flock, and burn also the bones under it, and make it boil well, and let them seethe the bones of it therein.
verses.ct: Use the best of the flock. Stack fuel beneath it around the bones, bring it to a rolling boil, and let the bones cook inside it.'

verses.kjv: Wherefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Woe to the bloody city, to the pot whose scum is therein, and whose scum is not gone out of it! bring it out piece by piece; let no lot fall upon it.
verses.ct: Therefore, this is what the Lord GOD says: How terrible it will be for the city of bloodshed! She is like a pot coated with residue that has never been scrubbed clean. Pull out the pieces one by one, without choosing any particular order.

verses.kjv: For her blood is in the midst of her; she set it upon the top of a rock; she poured it not upon the ground, to cover it with dust;
verses.ct: The blood she shed is still exposed within her. She left it on bare rock — she didn't pour it on the ground where dirt could cover it.

verses.kjv: That it might cause fury to come up to take vengeance; I have set her blood upon the top of a rock, that it should not be covered.
verses.ct: To stir up my anger and bring about punishment, I have left her blood exposed on bare rock where it cannot be hidden.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Woe to the bloody city! I will even make the pile for fire great.
verses.ct: Therefore, this is what the Lord GOD says: How terrible it will be for the city of bloodshed! I myself will pile the fuel high.

verses.kjv: Heap on wood, kindle the fire, consume the flesh, and spice it well, and let the bones be burned.
verses.ct: Stack on more wood, light the fire, cook the meat thoroughly, mix in the spices, and let the bones be charred.

verses.kjv: Then set it empty upon the coals thereof, that the brass of it may be hot, and may burn, and that the filthiness of it may be molten in it, that the scum of it may be consumed.
verses.ct: Then place the empty pot on the hot coals so its bronze glows red-hot, melting away its impurities and burning off its residue.

verses.kjv: She hath wearied herself with lies, and her great scum went not forth out of her: her scum shall be in the fire.
verses.ct: All efforts have been exhausting and useless — her thick residue will not come off. Into the fire with her residue!

verses.kjv: In thy filthiness is lewdness: because I have purged thee, and thou wast not purged, thou shalt not be purged from thy filthiness any more, till I have caused my fury to rest upon thee.
verses.ct: Your filthiness involves disgusting wickedness. I tried to cleanse you, but you refused to be cleansed. You will not be purified from your filthiness until I have fully unleashed my anger against you.

verses.kjv: I the LORD have spoken it: it shall come to pass, and I will do it; I will not go back, neither will I spare, neither will I repent; according to thy ways, and according to thy doings, shall they judge thee, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.ct: I, the LORD, have declared it. The time has arrived, and I will carry it out. I will not hold back, I will not show pity, and I will not change my mind. You will be judged according to your behavior and your actions, declares the Lord GOD."

verses.kjv: Also the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: Then a message from the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, behold, I take away from thee the desire of thine eyes with a stroke: yet neither shalt thou mourn nor weep, neither shall thy tears run down.
verses.ct: "Son of man, pay attention — with a single blow I am about to take from you the person you love most. But you must not grieve openly or cry, and you must not shed any tears.

verses.kjv: Forbear to cry, make no mourning for the dead, bind the tire of thine head upon thee, and put on thy shoes upon thy feet, and cover not thy lips, and eat not the bread of men.
verses.ct: Groan quietly, but do not perform any mourning rituals for the dead. Keep your turban on your head and your sandals on your feet. Do not cover the lower part of your face, and do not eat the customary food that mourners eat."

verses.kjv: So I spake unto the people in the morning: and at even my wife died; and I did in the morning as I was commanded.
verses.ct: So I spoke to the people that morning, and that evening my wife died. The next morning I did exactly as I had been commanded.

verses.kjv: And the people said unto me, Wilt thou not tell us what these things are to us, that thou doest so?
verses.ct: The people asked me, "Won't you explain to us what this means for us — why you're acting this way?"

verses.kjv: Then I answered them, The word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: I told them, "A message from the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: Speak unto the house of Israel, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I will profane my sanctuary, the excellency of your strength, the desire of your eyes, and that which your soul pitieth; and your sons and your daughters whom ye have left shall fall by the sword.
verses.ct: 'Say to the people of Israel: This is what the Lord GOD says — Pay attention, I am about to desecrate my sanctuary, the source of your pride and strength, the place your eyes delight in, the thing your soul treasures. And the sons and daughters you left behind will be killed by the sword.

verses.kjv: And ye shall do as I have done: ye shall not cover your lips, nor eat the bread of men.
verses.ct: Then you will do exactly what I have done: you will not cover the lower part of your face, and you will not eat the customary mourning food.

verses.kjv: And your tires shall be upon your heads, and your shoes upon your feet: ye shall not mourn nor weep; but ye shall pine away for your iniquities, and mourn one toward another.
verses.ct: Your turbans will stay on your heads and your sandals on your feet. You will not grieve openly or cry. Instead, you will waste away because of your sins, groaning to one another.

verses.kjv: Thus Ezekiel is unto you a sign: according to all that he hath done shall ye do: and when this cometh, ye shall know that I am the Lord GOD.
verses.ct: Ezekiel will serve as an example for you. Everything he has done, you will do as well. When this happens, you will recognize that I am the Lord GOD.'"

verses.kjv: Also, thou son of man, shall it not be in the day when I take from them their strength, the joy of their glory, the desire of their eyes, and that whereupon they set their minds, their sons and their daughters,
verses.ct: "And you, son of man — on the day I take away their stronghold, their magnificent joy, the delight of their eyes, and what their hearts are set on — their sons and their daughters —

verses.kjv: That he that escapeth in that day shall come unto thee, to cause thee to hear it with thine ears?
verses.ct: on that day, a survivor will come to you and report the news with his own mouth.

verses.kjv: In that day shall thy mouth be opened to him which is escaped, and thou shalt speak, and be no more dumb: and thou shalt be a sign unto them; and they shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.ct: On that day, your ability to speak will be restored when you meet the survivor. You will talk again and no longer be silent. You will serve as a sign to them, and they will recognize that I am the LORD."
